data.title: Template:HomeTheatreGeeks/doc
data.text:
Link to a person interviewed on the TV show Home Theatre Geeks.

The show is an hour-long interview show focused on one person and is free.

They are a good source of first-hand reference material about the person being interviewed and their specialist subjects.

Provide the episode number as the first parameter, and an optional name as the second parameter. If no name is provided for the second parameter, the template will use the name of the Wikipedia article.

{{HomeTheatreGeeks|Episode number|Interviewee name}}

Example:

{{HomeTheatreGeeks|168|Ioan Allen}}

Appears as:

Ioan Allen interviewed on the TV show Home Theatre Geeks on the TWiT.tv network
